prompt: Cinematic wide shot: a neon-soaked Venice Beach at golden hour, hundreds of color-clad figures sprinting face-first into a churning teal ocean, their limp bodies swept out in perfect rows like human driftwood; foreground, a kaleidoscope-dressed girl thrusts a worn feminist book toward the camera, eyes urgent, while behind her a man in mirrored shades tilts a hand-mirror upskirt, the scene vibrating with surreal, high-saturation dread — 35mm anamorphic, lens flare, hyper-real.
Zoom in on the leather book pulsing in your hands as mirror shards float off the vendor’s stand and stick to the page margins, spelling WITNESS.
